entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
